p: A few CC adaptation projects deployed focus groups to explore e.g., adaptation strategies for agricultural production ( Dumenu and Obeng, 2016), new indicators for building resilience against diseases ( Dovie et al., 2017), microfinance as means to foster adaptation for household livelihood ( Fenton et al., 2017), scientific communication to facilitate the adaptation of residential buildings ( Glaas et al., 2017), social issues grounding different responses to adaptation ( Sapkota et al., 2016), adaptation pathways in urban water supply systems ( Kingsborough et al., 2016), or adaptation frameworks for tourism destinations ( Wyss et al., 2014).
